metadata.description: Comprehensive column mapping for real estate data platform

tract_data_index.description: State-level summary of tract data coverage and file locations

total_tracts.description: Number of census tracts in state

tracts_with_redfin.description: Tracts with real estate market data

geojson_file.description: Map boundaries file for this state

tract_data_index.usage: Use to find which state files contain tract data and check coverage quality

zip_data_index.description: Individual ZIP code lookup with file locations and data availability

geojson_file.description: Map boundaries file containing this ZIP

data_file.description: CSV file containing this ZIP's data

city_name.description: Main city name for ZIP code

zip_data_index.usage: Use to find which state files contain specific ZIP codes and check data availability

county_data_index.description: County-level data availability across all sources

has_redfin_data.description: Whether county has real estate market data

county_data_index.usage: Use to check data completeness and find counties with specific data types

tract_to_county.linking_method: Extract first 5 digits from tract GEOID
tract_to_county.description: Census tracts roll up to counties via GEOID prefix

tract_to_state.linking_method: Extract first 2 digits from tract GEOID
tract_to_state.description: Census tracts roll up to states via GEOID prefix

zip_to_state.linking_method: Use state_code field in ZIP index
zip_to_state.description: ZIP codes link to states via lookup table

county_to_state.linking_method: Extract first 2 digits from county FIPS
county_to_state.description: Counties roll up to states via FIPS prefix

county_files.data_source: Embedded in state-level files and FRED data

tract_coverage.high_coverage_states: Major metro states (CA, TX, FL, NY)

find_state_data.description: Load all data for a specific state
find_state_data.method: Use tract_data_index.csv to get filenames, then load state files
find_state_data.example: User selects 'Alabama' → Load AL_tract_data.csv and AL_tract_geometry.geojson

find_zip_data.description: Find which file contains specific ZIP code data
find_zip_data.method: Query zip_data_index.csv for zipcode, get data_file and geojson_file

check_data_quality.description: Show user what data is available for their area
check_data_quality.method: Use index files to show coverage statistics
check_data_quality.example: Show 'This county has 85% Redfin coverage' before loading

build_navigation.method: Use hierarchy relationships for state → county → tract/ZIP navigation
build_navigation.example: State dropdown → County dropdown → Tract/ZIP selection

demographics_race.description: Population breakdown by race and ethnicity

bar.description: Good for comparing values across categories

line.description: Good for showing trends over time

pie.description: Good for showing parts of a whole
